summary: Some small tweaks made by me
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b]Requiem - Knockdown tweak[/b][/size]

This mod makes all big enemy have knockdown ability with requiem's mess system, and those knockdown effect can be blocked now.
The creatures can knockdown you : Dragon, Giant, Dwemer centurion, Frost atronach, Bear, Sabrecat, Troll, Lurker

requirement : fozar's dragonborn patch, fozar2(in requiem discord)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[size=4][b]Requiem - npc statefix[/b][/size]

Some npc in requiem didn't have proper perks and equipment. This mod make them more consistent with the story. You can see the changelog for detail.

Feature enemy have been tweaked :
Orc invader, Thief(random encounter), Skooma dealer(random encounter), Red eagle, Companion ghost, Orc chiefs

Feature follower have been tweaked :
Erandur, Mercenary followers
author: Sunny333456

files.name: req_npc_statefix
files.changelogHtml:
Thief(random encounter) have some perks now.
Skooma dealer(random encounter) have proper equipment and perks now. PC can no longer rob him easily.
Red eagle now is a tough enemy. He may not be as strong as story describing, but still a good challenge.

files.name: req_npc_statefix_v1_2
files.changelogHtml:
Companion ghost is properly perked now. They are no longer as weak as bandit.
Give orc chiefs perk and equipment.(you can brawl with them)

files.name: req_npc_statefix_v1_3
files.changelogHtml:
Tweak the companion ghost again. Ysgramor will weaken the magic inside his tomb.They have very high MR now, so you'd better be a strong warrior to enter the tomb of Ysgramor.
Tweak all the mercenary followers. They will no longer cheat your 5000 septims with their novice skills.(This will not work if you had hired them in your save before update)

Whiterun - Jenassa
main skills : evasion, one-hand(sword), marksman
minor skills : sneak, block

Windhelm - Stenvar
main skills : two-hand(great sword), heavy armor, block
minor skills : marksman, one-hand

Riften - Marcurio
main skills : restoration, destruction(lighting)
minor skills : conjuration, alteration
lesser skills : one-hand, evasion

Solitude - Belrand
main skills : evasion, one-hand(war axe), destruction
minor skills : restoration
lesser skills : conjuration, alteration

Markath - Vorstag
main skills : killing falmer, one-hand(war axe), heavy armor, block
minor skills : two-hand, marksman

Rorikstead - Erik the Slayer
main skills : farming

files.name: req_npc_statefix_V1_3a
files.changelogHtml:
tweak orc invader again
fix some bug
